directions: Heat the oil in a large pot over low heat. Add the onion; cook 10 minutes. Crumble in the sausage; brown over medium-high heat about 10 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 1 pound sweet Italian sausage, removed from casing
2 pounds leftover roast beef , cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 cups drained canned Italian plum tomatoes, crushed
1 tablespoon chopped chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
title: Hot-Stuff Chili
